Ability.Name: Initial
Ability.Lua:
if PQR_RotationStarted == true then PQR_RotationStarted = false if PQR_LoadLua ~= nil then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_CuteOne.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("Put PQR_CuteOne.lua in the data folder.", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end end rotchange = 0 end
if (select(2, UnitClass("player")) ~= "MONK") then print("Error: Wrong Class") PQR_StopRotation() elseif (GetSpecialization() == nil and UnitLevel("player") >= 10) then print("Error: Wrong Spec - None selected!") PQR_StopRotation() end
shcom()
aggro = UnitThreatSituation(t)
------Abilities------ bok = 100784 --Blackout Kick chw = 115098 --Chi Wave cjl = 117952 --Crackling Jade Lightning dhm = 122278 --Dampen Harm dis = 116095 --Disable dtx = 115450 --Detox enb = 115288 --Energizing Brew exh = 115072 --Expel Harm fof = 113656 --Fists of Fury fsk = 101545 --Flying Serpent Kick ftb = 115203 --Fortifying Brew grb = 117368 --Grapple Weapon inx = 123904 --Invoke Xuen jab = 108557 --Jab loe = 115921 --Legacy of the Emporor lsw = 119381 --Leg Sweep lwt = 116781 --Legacy of the White Tiger nmb = 137562 --Nimble Brew par = 115078 --Paralysis pro = 115546 --Provoke res = 115178 --Resuscitate rol = 109132 --Roll rsk = 107428 --Raising Sun Kick sck = 101546 --Spinning Crane Kick sfb = 115073 --Spinning Fire Blossom sft = 103985 --Stance of the Fierce Tiger shs = 116705 --Spear Hand Strike teb = 116740 --Tigereye Brew tpm = 100787 --Tiger Palm tod = 115080 --Touch of Death tok = 122470 --Touch of Karma znp = 126892 --Zen Pilgramage zns = 124081 --Zen Sphere
------Buffs/Debuffs------ chi = UnitPower(p,12) --Tracking Chi Count mch = UnitPowerMax(p,12) --Tracking Max Chi Count dth = 121125 --Tracking Touch of Death Availability tpw = 125359 --Tiger Power cbt = 118864 --Combo Breaker: Tiger Palm cbk = 116768 --Combo Breaker: Blackout Kick zsb = 124081 --Zen Sphere Buff tes = 125195 --Tigereye Brew Stacks dbl = 116706 --Disable (root)
------Tracking------ -- Tiger Power Remain if ubid(p,tpw) then tpr = (select(7, ubid(p,tpw)) - GetTime()) else tpr = 0 end -- Combo Breaker: Tiger Palm Remain if ubid(p,cbt) then ctr = (select(7, ubid(p,cbt)) - GetTime()) else ctr = 0 end -- Zen Sphere Buff Remain if ubid(p,zsb) then zsr = (select(7, ubid(p,zsb)) - GetTime()) else zsr = 0 end -- Touch of Death Ability if death==nil or plvl < 22 then death = false end if UnitExists(t) and plvl>=22 and cd(tod)==0 and not UnitIsPlayer(t) then if not UnitIsDeadOrGhost(t) then if (ubid(p,dth) or thealth < phmax) then if GlyphCheck(123391) or chi>=3 then death = true else death = false end else death = false end else death = false end else death = false end -- Tigereye Brew Count if select(4,ubid(p,tes)) == nil then tec = 0 else tec = select(4,ubid(p,tes)) end -- Tigereye Brew Buff Remain if ubid(p,teb,"EXACT|PLAYER") then tbr = (select(7, ubid(p,teb,"EXACT|PLAYER")) - GetTime()) else tbr = 0 end -- Raising Sun Kick Debuff Remain if udbid(t,rsk,p) then rsr = (select(7, udbid(t,rsk,p)) - GetTime()) else if plvl>=56 then if cd(rsk)~=0 then rsr = 999 else rsr = 0 end else rsr = 999 end end -- Fists of Fury Haste ffh = (4 / (1 + UnitSpellHaste(p) / 100))
-- CD Switch if PQ_CDMode==nil then PQ_CDMode = "Boss" end if IsRightControlKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - PQ_CDTimer > 0.25 then PQ_CDTimer = GetTime()
if not PQ_CD then PQ_CD = CD_BossOnly PQ_CDMode = "Boss" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cff79BAECBoss Only|cffffffff", "Notice") elseif PQ_CD == CD_BossOnly then PQ_CD = CD_Auto PQ_CDMode = "On" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cff006400On|cffffffff", "Notice") else PQ_CD = false PQ_CDMode = "Off" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cffDC143COff|cffffffff", "Notice") end end
-- AoE/Single Switch if AOEMode == nil then AOEMode = 0 end if PQ_Rot == nil then PQ_Rot = "Single" end
if IsRightShiftKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - PQ_AOETimer > 0.25 then PQ_AOETimer = GetTime()
if PQ_AOE then PQ_AOE = false AOEMode = 0 PQ_Rot = "Single" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CAOE Mode: |cffDC143CSingle|cffffffff", "Notice") elseif AOEMode==0 then PQ_AOE = true AOEMode = 1 PQ_Rot = "Multi" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CAOE Mode: |cff006400Multi|cffffffff", "Notice") end end PQR_Event("PQR_Text",'CD-Mode: '..PQ_CDMode..' --- '..'AOE-Mode: '..PQ_Rot)
GroupInfo() timecheck() --Dummy 5min DPS Test --if UnitExists("target") then -- if cTime >= 300 and dummy() then -- StopAttack() -- ClearTarget() -- print("5 Minute Dummy Test Concluded - Profile Stopped") -- PQR_StopRotation() -- end --end if incom and ((cTime < 300 and dummy()) or not dummy()) then if not IsMounted() and (not UnitExists("target") or UnitIsDead("target")) then if incom and AOEMode==1 then TargetNearestEnemy() end if sir(gsi(108557),t)==1 then RunMacroText("/startattack") end end end if UnitExists("target") and not UnitIsDead("target") and sir(gsi(108557),t)==1 then RunMacroText("/startattack") end

Ability.Name: Jab
Ability.Lua: if check(jab) and pow>=40 and death==false then if AOEMode==0 then if plvl < 3 then cast(gsi(jab)) end if chi <= 2 and (php>=80 or cd(exh)~=0) then cast(gsi(jab)) end end if AOEMode==1 then if chi < 2 and (rsr<=1 and plvl > 56) then cast(gsi(jab)) end if chi < 1 and tpr<=1 then cast(gsi(jab)) end end end

Ability.Name: Expel Harm
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=26 then if cd(exh)==0 and pow>=40 and chi<=3 and (php < 80 or (outcom and not IsMounted()and not pchannel and not pcasting and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost(p) and not ubid(p,104934) and not ubid(p,104269))) and death==false then cast(gsi(exh)) end end

Ability.Name: Tiger Palm
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=3 then if check(tpm) and death==false then if plvl < 7 then cast(gsi(tpm)) end if chi>=1 and tpr <= 3 then cast(gsi(tpm)) end if chi>=1 and tpr==0 and rsr > 1 and tmp > 1 then cast(gsi(tpm)) end if (ctr > 0 and tmp>=2) or (ctr<=2 and ctr > 0) then cast(gsi(tpm)) end --if ctr > 0 and (ctr < 2 or tmp < 2) then -- cast(gsi(tpm)) --end end end

Ability.Name: Blackout Kick
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=7 then if check(bok) and (chi>=2 or ubid(p,cbk)) and death==false and AOEMode==0 then if plvl>=56 then -- if rsr > 1 or (chi >= 3 and tmp < 2) or ubid(p,cbk) or chi==mch then -- cast(gsi(bok)) -- end if ubid(p,cbk) then cast(gsi(bok)) end if (pow+(repow*cd(rsk)))>=40 then cast(gsi(bok)) end end if plvl < 56 then cast(gsi(bok)) end end end

Ability.Name: Fists of Fury
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=10 then if incom and cd(fof)==0 and sir(gsi(jab),t)==1 --and pow<=30 and death==false and chi>=3 and tpr > 4 and tmp > 4 --ffh and not ubid(p,enb) and not PQR_IsMoving(0.5) then cast(gsi(fof)) end end

Ability.Name: Touch of Death
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=22 then if plvl>=24 and cd(ftb)==0 and cd(tod)==0 and sir(gsi(tod),t)==1 and thp > phmax and thp <= (phmax * 0.2 + phmax) then cast(gsi(ftb)) end if death==true and cd(tod)==0 and sir(gsi(tod),t)==1 then cast(gsi(tod)) end end

Ability.Name: Detox
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=20 then if ValidDispel(p) and cd(dtx)==0 and pow>=20 then cast(gsi(dtx),p) end if ValidDispel("mouseover") and cd(dtx)==0 and pow>=20 then cast(gsi(dtx),"mouseover") end end

Ability.Name: Defensive
Ability.Lua:
if not IsMounted() and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost(p) then -- Zen Spheres if plvl>=30 and select(5,GetTalentInfo(5))==true then if zsr<=1 and cd(zns)==0 and members[1].HP < php and not udbid(members[1].Unit, 137341, nil) and not LineOfSight(members[1].Unit) then PQR_CustomTarget = members[1].Unit cast(gsi(zns),PQR_CustomTarget) else if zsr<=1 and cd(zns)==0 and php<=75 then cast(gsi(zns),p) end end end -- Dampen Harm if plvl>=75 and TalentCheck(122278) then if php<=75 and cd(dhm)==0 then cast(gsi(dhm),p) end end -- Touch of Karma if plvl>=22 then if php<=50 and cd(tok)==0 and UnitExists(t) then cast(gsi(tok),t) end end -- Fortifying Brew if plvl>=24 then if php<=40 and cd(ftb)==0 then cast(gsi(ftb)) end end
-- Healthstone if php < 30 and GetItemCount(5512,false,false) > 0 and ( select(2, GetItemCooldown(5512)) == 0 ) then UseItemByName(5512) end
-- Health Potion if php < 25 and CanHealPot() then UseItemByName(drinkme) end end

Ability.Name: Pause
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftAltKeyDown() or IsMounted() or SpellIsTargeting() or not UnitExists("Target") or UnitBuffID("Player",80169) or UnitBuffID("Player",87959) or UnitChannelInfo("Player") or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("Player") or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("Target") or UnitBuffID("target",117961) or not UnitAffectingCombat("Player") then return true end

Ability.Name: Legacy of the Emperor
Ability.Lua: if not IsMounted() and outcom and plvl >= 22 and not ubid(p,104934) and not ubid(p,104269) and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost(p) and not pcasting and not pchannel then for i=1,#members do if not HaveBuff(members[i].Unit,{115921,20217,1126,90363}) and (#members==select(5,GetInstanceInfo()) or select(2,IsInInstance())=="none") then return true end end end

Ability.Name: Interrupts
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=32 then if incom and check(shs) and Interruptable(t,shs) then cast(gsi(shs),t) end end if plvl>=60 then if TalentCheck(119381) and incom and cd(lsw)==0 and sir(gsi(jab),t)==1 and (Interruptable(t,lsw) or (tcasting or tchannel)) then cast(gsi(lsw),t) end end if plvl>=44 then if incom and check(par) and (cd(shs)~=0 or sir(gsi(jab),t)~=1) and (Interruptable(t,par) or ((tcasting or tchannel) and not SpecialUnit())) then cast(gsi(par),t) end if incom and check(par) and Interruptable("mouseover",par) and not SpecialUnit() then cast(gsi(par),"mouseover") end end

Ability.Name: Provoke
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=14 and not IsMounted() then if outcom and select(2,IsInInstance())=="none" and not LineOfSight(t) and not UnitInParty(p) and not UnitInRaid(p) then if check(pro) then cast(gsi(pro)) end end end

Ability.Name: Resuscitate
Ability.Lua: if plvl >= 18 then if UnitExists("mouseover") and not UnitAffectingCombat(p) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost("mouseover") and UnitCanCooperate(p, "mouseover") and sir(gsi(res),"mouseover") == 1 and cd(res) == 0 and not PQR_IsOutOfSight("mouseover") and not UnitCastingInfo(p) and UnitChannelInfo(p) == nil then cast(gsi(res),"mouseover") end end

Ability.Name: Energizing Brew
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=36 then if incom and check(enb) and tmp > 5 and death==false then cast(gsi(enb)) end end

Ability.Name: Chi Wave
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=30 then if check(chw) and sir(gsi(jab),t)==1 and death==false then if plvl>=56 then if tmp > 2 then--rsr>=1 then cast(gsi(chw)) end else cast(gsi(chw)) end end if incom and sir(gsi(jab),t)==0 and sir(gsi(chw),t)==1 then cast(gsi(chw)) end end

Ability.Name: Nimble Brew
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=30 then if LossOfControl(nmb)==true and cd(nmb)==0 then cast(gsi(nmb)) end end

Ability.Name: Spinning Crane Kick
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=46 then if AOEMode==1 and pow>=40 and sir(gsi(jab),t)==1 and tpr > 1 and (rsr > 1 or plvl < 56) and not death then cast(gsi(sck)) end end

Ability.Name: Spinning Fire Blossom
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=48 and AOEMode==0 and incom then if cd(sfb)==0 and sir(gsi(jab),t)==0 and sir(gsi(cjl),t)==1 and chi>=1 and not pchannel then cast(gsi(sfb),t) end end

Ability.Name: Raising Sun Kick
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=56 then if cd(rsk)==0 and sir(gsi(rsk),t)==1 and chi>=2 and tpr > 1 and death==false then cast(gsi(rsk)) end end

Ability.Name: Tigereye Brew
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=56 then if incom and death==false then if tbr < 1 and cd(rsk)==0 and chi>=2 and rsr > 0 and tpr > 0 and tec > 0 then cast(gsi(teb),nil) end if tbr < 1 and tec >= 10 then cast(gsi(teb),nil) end end end

Ability.Name: Disable
Ability.Lua:
if PQR_CheckUIError(SPELL_FAILED_IMMUNE)==true then if UnitExists(t) then immtar = UnitGUID(t) immune = true end end if outcom or UnitExists(t) then if outcom or UnitGUID(t)~=immtar then immune = false end end
if thp<=25 and pow>=15 and sir(gsi(jab),t)==1 and not udbid(t,dbl,p) and immune and not SpecialUnit() then cast(gsi(dis)) end if thp<=25 and pow>=15 and sir(gsi(jab),t)==1 and not udbid(t,dbl,p) and immune and not SpecialUnit() then cast(gsi(dis)) end

Ability.Name: Trinkets
Ability.Lua: if sir(gsi(jab),t)==1 then if incom and GetInventoryItemCooldown(p,13) == 0 then UseInventoryItem(13) end if incom and GetInventoryItemCooldown(p,14) == 0 then UseInventoryItem(14) end end

Ability.Name: Legacy of the White Tiger
Ability.Lua: if not IsMounted() and outcom and plvl >= 81 and not ubid(p,104934) and not ubid(p,104269) and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost(p) and not pcasting and not pchannel then for i=1,#members do if not HaveBuff(members[i].Unit,{116781,17007,1459,61316,24604,90309,126373,126309}) and (#members==select(5,GetInstanceInfo()) or select(2,IsInInstance())=="none") then return true end end end

Ability.Name: Grapple Weapon
Ability.Lua:
if plvl >= 68 then if PQR_CheckUIError(SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NO_RANGED_WEAPONS)==true then if UnitExists(t) then grabtar = UnitGUID(t) grapple = false end end if outcom or UnitExists(t) then if outcom or UnitGUID(t)~=grabtar then grapple = true end end
if incom and cd(grb)==0 and sir(gsi(jab),t)==1 and grapple then cast(gsi(grb)) end end

Ability.Name: Invoke Xuen
Ability.Lua: if incom and plvl>=90 and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) and cd(inx)==0 and sir(gsi(jab),t)==1 -- and ttd(t)>=18 then cast(gsi(inx)) end

Ability.Name: Flying Serpent Kick
Ability.Lua: if incom and cd(gsi(fsk))==0 and sir(gsi(jab),t)==1 and pow < 40 and chi < 2 and tpr > 2 and rsr > 2 then cast(gsi(fsk)) cast(gsi(fsk)) end

Ability.Name: Crackling Jade Lightning
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=54 and AOEMode==0 and incom then if chi < 1 and sir(gsi(jab),t)==0 and sir(gsi(cjl),t)==1 and not PQR_IsMoving(0.5) and pow>=40 then cast(gsi(cjl)) end end
